arts.ttl: Fullkrug nets winner as West Ham come from behind to beat Everton
arts.sum: Niclas Fullkrug came off the bench to net a well-placed winner as West Ham came from behind to beat Everton 2-1 in the Premier League Summer Series.

arts.ttl: Talking points ahead of West Ham Utd vs Everton
arts.sum: The Blues have been underwhelming in the pre-season so far.

arts.ttl: Talking points ahead of Everton vs West Ham
arts.sum: The Blues have been underwhelming in the pre-season so far.

arts.ttl: Everton make ‘serious initial approach’ for player – West Ham can also move in ‘next few hours’
arts.sum: Last week, the Italian press went a bit wild over Napoli’s interest in Jack Grealish. Excitement erupted after the Englishman arrived for a vacation in the Naples area and now Everton and West Ham have been talked up as suitors. arts.ttl: Everton vs West Ham United: Preview and predicted lineup
arts.sum: The Blues will look to secure a win after losing 3-0 to Bournemouth in the previous friendly.
